news.title: 'Lost our brother': Bandmates and fans pay tribute to Ozzy Osbourne
news.summary: The frontman of pioneering heavy metal band Black Sabbath has died in the UK at the age of 76.

news.title: 'A hospital gave us two death certificates for dad to cover up their mistake'
news.summary: Brian Holmes died at Castle Hill hospital, near Hull, which is at the centre of a police investigation.

news.title: 'I felt ignored by police when I was cyberflashed'
news.summary: Anna Downes says she contacted the BBC after she lost hope that the police would take her seriously.

news.title: Teeth marks suggest 'terror bird' was killed by reptile 13 million years ago
news.summary: Terror birds could be taller than a human and had powerful legs and hooked, flesh-ripping beaks.

news.title: The Papers: 'RIP Ozzy' and 'LionYESSS!'
news.summary: Rock musician Ozzy Osbourne's death and the Lionesses' Euro 2025 semi-final victory leads Wednesday's papers.

news.title: Does Edinburgh's Royal Mile need 72 tourist gift shops?
news.summary: People living in the area say they are seeing the overtourism problems being experienced across Europe.

news.title: Kendrick and SZA deliver stadium-worthy performance
news.summary: The pair performed as part of their joint Grand National Tour, delivering their greatest hits.

news.title: Idaho student killer heads to prison, but mysteries in the case remain
news.summary: Three years later, officials have offered no motive behind the brutal murders of four University of Idaho students

news.title: Terror warning over kids using screens over summer
news.summary: Britain's top crime agencies have said they are investigating children as young as 12 for terrorism-related offences.

news.title: 'Is this a movie?' - England overcome odds to reach final
news.summary: England have overcome all odds to reach the Euro 2025 - so how have they done it?
